PHRASE.LANG:

 This locomotion object will boost your speed:
 ・Standard = 5.25 m/s
 
 This bundle contains:

 (2) Hot Rod - Top Fuel
 (3) Hot Rod - Lowrider
 (4)Hot Rod - The Old Timer
 (5) Hot Rod - 50s Classic
 
 ※These items are portable items. [#Legal]
